snippet: The limited expansion of benefits will improve the treatment of gay and lesbian military personnel and their families.
abstract: Editorial praises Leon Panetta, departing defense secretary, for announcing limited expansion of benefits for same-sex partners of military personnel, saying it is important step to improve treatment of gay and lesbian service members and their families.
lead_paragraph: The limited expansion of benefits will improve the treatment of gay and lesbian military personnel and their families.

headline.seo: More Fairness for Gay and Lesbian Military Personnel

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
